attributes.action: Bring the 'Mighty Morphin Power Rangers' series to DVD in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to bring 'Mighty Morphin Power Rangers' series to DVD in England, because it has been a hit tv show for many people and it would be great for it to be on DVD.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
